OOC: is it just me, or is that post old?
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Jen D. 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2001 8:=
03 PM
  Subject: Re: Out of the Fire


  (ooc: Robo, the hologram of the ci=
ty ispretty much what you and yan decided 
  on it :)

  +++Mantle Cyndro M=
ist Rubble Aqua Cinder Cledar Forrior Rixer Truttle 
  Blyer+++

  Mantle s=
miled and then walked off toward the bridge after watching Prowl 
  walk in=
 with a few injured bots and then walk out. He talked to Epyon while 
  he =
walked.

  "This ship was a big experiment, but I think its very good. Hasn=
't failed us 
  yet." With that he entered the bridge and sat down at the c=
ommander's chair. 
  The bridge was a very big round room with computers al=
l around, and the 
  commander's char was on a raised platform in the cente=
r, so that the 
  commander could oversee everything that was going on. The=
re were reports of 
  security cameras and stanners and everything on the c=
omputer screens, some 
  even had computer games on them! Mantle tapped a f=
ew buttons and a 3d 
  hologram of a battle city, at least how Cyndro had d=
esigned it from what 
  Mantle and Epyon had been talking about when they e=
ntered the Element. "How 
  does that look?" Mantle asked Epyon. "If its ac=
ceptable, we can begin 
  construction right away."

  Even though missiles=
 and laser shots were hitting the shields, the robots 
  inside probably co=
uldn't tell that anything was different. The ship didn't 
  shake, the ligh=
ts didn't blink, and everything remained the same. Outside, 
  however, Cyn=
dro focused his firepower on the attackers. Three missiles 
  launched out =
at Sixshot, and three at Ares, followed by alot of plasma shots 
  at both.=
 He also fired four missiles at Imprisoner.



  Mist watched Surgital bein=
g attacked, and didn't waste time. She aimed at 
  Surgital's head and fire=
d two charges. Below her, Rubble fired two missiles 
  up at Surgital's but=
t :), while Aqua and Cinder decided to take down the 
  bots that Abominus =
just seperated into. They both turned around. Aqua fired 
  two spears at H=
unger and Cinder fired three laser shots at Rippersnapper.



  Cledar look=
ed around the battlefield and noticed that there were alot of 
  injured Ma=
ximals. He made a mental note to talk to the commander of this 
  faction a=
fter the battle, and then decided to fire a few more times at 
  someone, a=
nd shot his fusion cannon up at Surgital. He was sure that the 
  huge beam=
 of plasma would hit.



  A large burst of flame was shot out of Forrior's=
 tank bottom and sent him 
  flying up above the missile and the shots. He =
landed near Predator and fired 
  his fusion cannon at him almost form poin=
t-blank range.



  Rixer jumped forward and avoided a missile coming at hi=
m, but several shots 
  still hit him in the side. He rolled under a bunch =
more shots and then 
  jumped up and fired a missile and twenty shots at Su=
n Crusher.



  Truttle ducked under a shot from Predator and chuckled to h=
imself. So far 
  these Predacons were very bad at fighting. He saw Reflect=
or firing at Rixer, 
  aimed both of his machine guns, and sent fifty laser=
 bolts out toward 
  Reflector.



  The missiles that Blyer fired earlier =
barely missed the Cybertronian Fire, 
  and hit the ground harmlessly. Blye=
r aimed again, this time with laser 
  cannons, and fired twenty rapid lase=
r shots from each of his wing cannons at 
  Firestarter.
